Looks like some comments have disappeared, so I'm re-stating some information:

Lazypie and other leechers: 1.00 ratio isn't good enough. If noone continue to seed after 1.00 BT won't work. Myself I ALWAYS continue to a ratio of 2.00, and sometimes I even reach a ratio of about 250.0. However, if you only have an asynchronous line, such as ADSL, I can understand if you stop at a ratio of 1.50 or thereabouts.
